## Manual vs Automatic Review

### Automatic Review (Default)
```
PR Event (open, sync, ready_for_review)
    â†“
Workflow Triggered Automatically
    â†“
Current PR Reviewed
    â†“
Results Posted to PR
```

### Manual Review (workflow_dispatch)
```
User Triggers Workflow
    â†“
System Scans All Open PRs
    â†“
Identifies Highest Priority PR
    â†“
Reviews That PR
    â†“
Results Posted to PR
```

## Decision Tree: Review Outcome

```
                    Start Review
                         |
                         v
                  Analyze Changes
                         |
            â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
            v                         v
      Critical Issues?           Documentation
            |                       Only?
            |                         |
        Yes | No               Yes |  No
            |                     |
            v                     v
    Request Changes         Auto-Approve
                                  |
                    â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
                    v                           v
                P0 PR?                    Issues Found?
                    |                           |
                Yes | No                   Yes | No
                    |                           |
                    v                           v
           Comment Only                      Approve
           (Require Human)
```

## Label Management Flow

```

    â†“
Automated Review Runs
    â†“

    â†“
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”

    v             v

    |             |
```

## Key Benefits

### For Authors
âœ… **Immediate Feedback** - Get review within minutes  
âœ… **Clear Issues** - Specific problems identified  
âœ… **Learn Best Practices** - Consistent code quality guidance  
âœ… **Faster Iterations** - Quick fix-review cycle  

### For Reviewers
âœ… **Less Routine Work** - Bot handles common issues  
âœ… **Focus on Logic** - Spend time on important decisions  
âœ… **Consistent Standards** - Same checks applied to all PRs  
âœ… **Better Coverage** - All PRs get reviewed  

### For Project
âœ… **Higher Quality** - Catch issues early  
âœ… **Faster Velocity** - Reduced review bottleneck  
âœ… **Security** - Automated vulnerability detection  
âœ… **Documentation** - Consistent process  

## Metrics Tracked

- **Review Time**: Time from PR creation to first review
- **Issue Detection Rate**: % of PRs with issues found
- **False Positive Rate**: % of incorrect issue flagging
- **Auto-Approval Rate**: % of PRs auto-approved
- **Critical Issue Rate**: % of PRs with critical issues
- **Priority Distribution**: Breakdown by P0/P1/P2/P3
